document.full_text: islamist militants killed 13 algerian soldiers in the country's northern kabylie region, the deadliest attack in months, a security source told reuters on saturday.
document.title: militants kill 13 soldiers east of algiers: security source
lines_and_colors: islamist militants killed 13 algerian soldiers in the country's northern kabylie region, the deadliest attack in months, a security source told reuters on saturday.
